title: Medium English Quiz 3
description: Test your English skills with this 10-question quiz. Good luck!
instructions: Read each question carefully and select the best answer from the choices provided.
There is only one correct answer for each question.
Once you have answered all the questions, click the "Submit" button to see your score.

items.question: Which of these words means 'to make a formal declaration'?
What is the past participle of 'strew'?
Which of these words means 'a feeling of intense dislike or aversion'?
Which of these words means 'excessively or elaborately ornamented'?
What is the past tense of 'choose'?
Which of these words means 'a person who is excessively or fanatically devoted to a particular cause or idea'?
What is the present perfect tense of 'to wax'?
Which of these sentences is grammatically correct?
choices: Between you and I, I think she's lying.
Between you and me, I think she's lying.
items.answer: Between you and me, I think she's lying.

items.question: Which of these words is closest in meaning to 'auspicious'?

scoring.8-10 correct answers: Excellent! You have a strong command of English.
scoring.5-7 correct answers: Good! You have a good understanding of English, but there are a few areas where you could improve.
scoring.2-4 correct answers: Fair. You have a basic understanding of English, but there are many areas where you need to improve.
scoring.0-1 correct answers: Needs improvement. You should consider taking an English language course or using resources to improve your English skills.
